text: The New People's Army (), abbreviated NPA or BHB, is the armed wing of the Communist Party of the Philippines (CPP). It acts as the CPP's principal organization. It was founded on March 29, 1969. The NPA has since began a guerrilla war based on the Maoist strategy of protracted people's war. ==References== Category:1960s establishments in the Philippines Category:1969 establishments in Asia Category:Political parties in Asia Category:Politics of the Philippines Category:Organizations based in the Philippines
title: New People's Army
